blogPost.excerpt: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
blogPost.body: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
blogPost.title: InCharge X - The 100W Swiss Army knife of cables
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1钥匙扣电缆。多亏了它的6种充电组合，你几乎可以在超高速下给任何设备充电。也有5英尺长的版本可供选择！
InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1鑰匙扣電纜。多虧了它的6種充電組合，你幾乎可以在超高速下給任何設備充電。也有5英尺長的版本可供選擇！

previous.excerpt: We make shapes that can talk. Shapes with personalities, with edges and corners.
previous.title: Circle - GPT-3 powered bots

localize.description: 我们制造会说话的形状。形状有个性，有边和角。
我們製造會說話的形狀。形狀有個性，有邊和角。

next.excerpt: Rolley Scooterson is an award-winning intelligent electric scooter, easy-to-ride, energy-efficient, and fully controlled from your smartphone. With its AI-powered algorithms, Scooterson's app makes riding Rolley seamless and effortless.
next.title: Rolley Scooterson - Intelligent electric scooter controlled from your smartphone

localize.description: 罗利滑板车是一款屡获殊荣的智能电动滑板车，易于驾驶，节能，完全可以通过智能手机进行控制。凭借其人工智能驱动的算法，斯库特森的应用程序使骑滚轮变得无缝和毫不费力。
localize.tagline: 智能手机控制的智能电动滑板车

localize.description: 羅利滑板車是一款屢獲殊榮的智能電動滑板車，易於駕駛，節能，完全可以通過智能手機進行控制。憑藉其人工智能驅動的算法，斯庫特森的應用程序使騎滾輪變得無縫和毫不費力。
localize.tagline: 智能手機控制的智能電動滑板車
